ygData.subject: Re: Digest Number 107
ygData.msgSnippet: well maybe we don t like seeing your message and the 500 messages on the same topic that i read yesterday or the day before.  So yes it may be another request
ygData.messageBody:
well maybe we don't like seeing your message and the 500 messages on the
same topic that i read yesterday or the day before. So yes it may be
another request to trim the message...but i think it makes it easier for
everyone. I think the only person it benefits is that guy on every list
who has an auto email answerer telling people he's not around. Noone
likes him anyway.

I hope to hell a cheat never comes out for this game. I personally would
be sickened and forced to move to a new game. If you want to cheat go
play UO or Diablo or something else. Leave this game for people who want
a challange. The people who get pleasure only out of cheating, breaking
and hacking into things to mess them up have a serious problem in my book
and should be shot. Im sick of playing a game and having a character run
by who cheated his way ahead of me cause he lack's the
talent/patience/skill to do it on his own.

Die cheaters die!

~S
